resources.string: Please enter your phone number below.

BriskPesa facilitates android developers to integrate with M-Pesa seamlessly for in-app payments.

 Users do not need to leave the application to make M-Pesa payments.

 Would you like to have this feature in your android app? Contact us: +254727893663 | info@mobiworld.co.ke | www.briskpesa.com

To complete a transaction, you will enter your Service PIN on the USSD pop up shown on clicking pay button. If you don\'t have one dial *126*5# for instructions.\n\n For more information visit http://www.safaricom.co.ke/personal/get-more/bonga-points/my-bonga-pin
